root: ^I’ve won your game. Can I have my memories now?

g-1: ^Haha, you have entertained me greatly! Who knew mortals could be so amusing…and somewhat musically talented. Not as much as me of course.
g-2: ^Are you happy now? I won and you said you would restore my memories.
g-3: ^Oh, you thought we were done? Did you really think it would be THAT simple?
g-4: ^Memories are sacred fragments of the mortal mind. I can’t just give them to you like that, that wouldn’t be any fun! Tell you what, let’s play another game.
g-5: ^I’ll give you fragments of your memories about the people closest to you, and you have to unscramble them. Then I will grant you the rest of yours.
g-6: ^Reorder the memory fragments in an order that makes the most logical sense.
^Press 'SUBMIT' when you think the memory fragments have been ordered correctly!
g-7: ^I have the stories of the lives of those around you, can you retell their story?
